key_mistakes.reason: Misplaced knight and loss of tempo.
Rook placed on the wrong file.
Exchanging rooks when maintaining tension was better.
Weakening pawn structure and creating vulnerabilities.
Premature pawn push weakening the position.

recommendations: Focus on maintaining a solid pawn structure to avoid creating weaknesses.
Improve piece activity by placing them on optimal squares.
Avoid unnecessary exchanges, especially when behind in material.
Ensure king safety by avoiding exposure and unnecessary checks.
Practice endgame scenarios to improve decision-making in critical positions.
